channel.title: Compile Errors
channel.description:
Hey everytime I compile it keeps giving me these 3 errors, no matter what I change it just keeps saying the same 3 errors, please help. (This is for my 659 server, if that makes a difference)
1. src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandsPacketHandler.java:36: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try{ ^
2. src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandsPacketHandler.java:1098: cannot find symbol symbol : class Catch location: class com.rs2hd.packethandler.CommandsPacketHandler } Catch Exception; ^
3. src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandsPacketHandler.java:1099: cannot find symbol symbol : method GetMessage() location: class com.rs2hd.model.Player player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Malformed command or error: " + player.GetMessage() + "."); ^ 3 errors Correctly compiled Server Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Problem 1 is caused because of problem 2. Replace your catch with catch (Exception e) { For problem 3, ensure that the method is spelled correctly and with proper casing. It looks like you just need to uppercase the ‘p’ in

player.GetMessage

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

mr.leecher:

okay thanks, do you know about the other ones?

You will have to find the right method to call, or create one.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

You can’t capitalize the ‘c’ in catch.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

mr.leecher:

you got teamviewer??

yes, but i am out of time for tonight. try to find the method or a similar method to what you are trying to call, and just surround the code with a try and catch. i’m not sure what the exception would be, so you are on your own for that one.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

mr.leecher:

i tried doing getMessage and it still gives the same error

i can’t help you with that unless i can see the source.

also, to fix your try and catch issue, try this:

try {
// code
} catch (ExceptionName e) {

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

two things:

[ul][li]you need to have a try and catch; it looks like you are trying to do it, but you aren’t doing it right.[/li]
[li]you are calling for the method GetMessage(); either it is just a badly named method, or it doesn’t exist, might be getMessage();[/li][/ul]

if you need anymore help, just ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Errors
item.dc:creator: @mr.leecher mr.leecher
item.description:
@mr.leecher wrote:

Hey everytime I compile it keeps giving me these 3 errors, no matter what I change it just keeps saying the same 3 errors, please help. (This is for my 659 server, if that makes a difference)

  1. src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandsPacketHandler.java:36: ‘try’ without ‘catch’
    or ‘finally’
    try{
    ^

  2. src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandsPacketHandler.java:1098: cannot find symbol
    symbol : class Catch
    location: class com.rs2hd.packethandler.CommandsPacketHandler
    } Catch Exception;
    ^

  3. src\com\rs2hd\packethandler\CommandsPacketHandler.java:1099: cannot find symbol
    symbol : method GetMessage()
    location: class com.rs2hd.model.Player
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Malformed command
    or error: " + player.GetMessage() + “.”);
    ^
    3 errors
    Correctly compiled Server
    Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
